description.value: Plate consists of shaped, interlocking metal plates to cover the entire body. A suit of plate includes gauntlets, heavy leather boots, a visored helmet, and thick layers of padding underneath the armor. Buckles and straps distribute the weight over the body.
A shield is made from wood or metal and is carried in one hand. Wielding a shield increases your Armor Class by 2. You can benefit from only one shield at a time.

The hobgoblin makes three melee attacks. Alternatively, it can make two ranged attacks with its javelins.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d8 + @mod type=slashing average=true]] damage, or [[/damage 1d10 + @mod type=slashing average=true]] damage if used with two hands.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: [[/damage 1d4 + @mod type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it must succeed on a [[/save str 14 format=long]] or be knocked &Reference[prone]{prone}.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d6 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

For 1 minute, the hobgoblin can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a d4 to its roll provided it can hear and understand the hobgoblin. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the hobgoblin is &Reference[incapacitated]{incapacitated}.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

aura.blockers: Convenient Effect: Dead;Convenient Effect: Incapacitated;Convenient Effect: Unconscious;
Convenient Effect: Dead;Convenient Effect: Incapacitated;Convenient Effect: Unconscious;

monsterMunch.titleHTML: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest).
monsterMunch.fullName: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest).

description.value:
Martial Advantage. Once per turn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra [[/damage 4d6 average=true]] damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin that isn’t &Reference[incapacitated]{incapacitated}.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

The hobgoblin adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the hobgoblin must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
